resources.string: Enter Room/Course/Group you wish to search for

This app was created in order to aid Glyndwr University Students in accessing University timetables. This seems necessary as the mobile site for accessing the timetables is poorly structured and is difficult to view on mobile phones. Also it only downloads the pdf rather than showing the pdf in site

Currently undertaking a MSc in Computer Science (PT), Connor has thus far developed skills in networking, python and android development with this App being his latest piece of work so far. If you wish to contact me about potential work or just like to enquire about this app I made please contact me at connorlaurence97@googlemail.com or you can find me on LinkedIn as Connor Laurence. Happy Coding!

Hi! Welcome to the Glyndwr Timetabling App Help section. Here you will find helpful hints on how to use the app. Should you come across any issues and would like to inform us then please contact me at: connorlaurence97@googlemail.com.

To search, simply type in and click search! From there select an item in the list. This will open a dialog where you can save a record or open to view it. To see your saved records, simply select the saved item in 'saved timetables' and use the open button in the dialog to view the PDF. From here you can also delete the record.
